title: Ghost Inspector Accessibility Testing
creator: Ghost Inspector, Inc.
description: Ghost Inspector allows you to build or record automated browser tests for your website that check both functionality and accessibility throughout, then run them continuously from the cloud. Perform automated WCAG audits with detailed reporting on any page or screen, even within a logged in web app.
